name: Gulha
short_description: Originating from the Maldives, these golden, deep-fried pastry balls burst with the flavors of smoky fish, sweet coconut, and savory onions. A beloved snack enjoyed at local cafés!

name: Mas huni
short_description: A beloved Maldivian breakfast, this vibrant dish combines fresh tuna, zesty onions, and creamy shredded coconut, all brought together with a kick of chili. Simple yet bursting with flavor!

name: Garudihya
short_description: Nourishing and vibrant, this Maldivian fish soup features tender tuna simmered to perfection in a savory broth, enhanced with aromatic spices and curry. A comforting staple that warms the soul.

name: Kulhimas
short_description: Originating from the Maldives, spiced tuna in Kulhimas bursts with flavor from onions, garlic, and fiery hot peppers. Each bite offers a taste of the islands' rich culinary heritage.

name: Maldivian Fish Curry (Mas riha)
short_description: Originating from the Maldives, this rich fish curry combines tender chunks of tuna and swordfish simmered in a fragrant blend of onion, garlic, and ginger, all enveloped in creamy coconut goodness.

name: Kukulku riha
short_description: A Maldivian classic, this chicken stew blends aromatic spices like ginger and garlic with rich ghee, creating a flavorful curry that warms the soul and celebrates local culinary heritage.

name: Masroshi
short_description: A beloved Maldivian snack, Masroshi features golden, fried dough filled with smoky tuna, fresh coconut, and a kick of hot peppers. Each bite offers a perfect blend of savory and spicy, celebrating island flavors.

name: Huni roshi
short_description: Originating from the Maldives, this traditional flatbread features a delightful blend of flour and grated coconut, cooked to golden perfection. Enjoy its soft, slightly chewy texture and subtle richness, perfect for pairing with savory dishes.

name: Keemiyaa
short_description: Originating from the Maldives, Keemiyaa features a savory blend of fresh tuna, fragrant spices, and zesty lemon, all encased in a golden, crispy shell. A beloved snack that bursts with flavor!

name: Kavaabu
short_description: Originating from the Maldives, Kavaabu features crispy fritters made with smoked tuna, zesty ginger, and fresh coconut. Bursting with flavor, these savory bites are perfect for snacking anytime.

name: Tuna Curry (Dhon riha)
short_description: Originating from the Maldives, this traditional tuna curry combines tender fresh tuna with rich coconut milk, aromatic ginger, and a hint of cinnamon. Each spoonful bursts with tropical flavors, reflecting the island's culinary heritage.

name: Miruhulee boava
short_description: Originating from the Maldives, tender octopus tentacles are braised with aromatic onions, garlic, and vibrant curry leaves, offering a spicy kick from hot peppers. A true taste of island tradition!

name: Dhonkeyo kajuru
short_description: Originating from the Maldives, these deep-fried fritters combine ripe bananas and grated coconut for a sweet, crispy delight. Golden and fragrant, they are a beloved snack enjoyed by locals and visitors alike.

name: Havaadhulee bis
short_description: Originating from the Maldives, curried tuna dumplings are a delightful blend of tender flour dough filled with spiced tuna and simmered in rich coconut milk, offering a taste of island comfort.

name: Bis riha
short_description: Originating from the Maldives, this fragrant stew combines eggs, dried fish, and rich coconut milk, simmered with aromatic spices like cumin and turmeric for a delightful taste of island culture.

name: Riha folhi
short_description: Originating from the Maldives, these vibrant turmeric-infused crepes are lovingly stuffed with flavorful tuna, onions, and a hint of curry powder, offering a delightful taste of island tradition.

name: Rihaakuru dhiya
short_description: A beloved Maldivian staple, this rich soup blends creamy coconut milk with zesty lemon, aromatic curry leaves, and fiery Scotch Bonnet peppers, creating a warm, comforting bowl full of island flavors.

name: Aluvi hiki riha
short_description: A beloved Maldivian comfort dish, tender potatoes are sautéed with aromatic onions, garlic, and ginger, then spiced with mustard seeds and Scotch Bonnet peppers, creating a flavorful, vibrant experience.

name: Fuhjehi kavaabu
short_description: Crispy Maldivian fritters blend fresh tuna, vibrant Scotch Bonnet pepper, and tender potatoes, all enveloped in a golden batter. A beloved snack, they pack a punch of flavor in every bite!
